title: Single of the Week: HeRobust – Grief Case (Star Slinger's WWHRD Remix)
body:
![](http://sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash2/hs564.ash2/148642_138921922824738_105042866212644_210025_2771278_n.jpg "SS")

He’s done it again. Fresh from announcing an extensive debut US tour with this years sensation **Baths**, **Star Slinger** has dropped another remix upon us, and it’s as exciting as ever. Touches of **The Avalanches** in this rework of **HeRobust’s** _Grief Case_, Darren’s Midas touch prevails once again, creating an atmospheric and distinctive tune. Having already created one of the songs of the year with his remix of **Coolrunnings** _I Am You_, 2010 is proving to be a fruitful year for **Star Slinger**. Receiving numerous mentions on Pitchfork, Darren will be looking to increase his fanbase in the coming weeks, leading up to the release of his second full length release, Volume 2.

 [HeRobust – Grief Case (Star Slinger’s WWHRD Remix)](http://soundcloud.com/starslingeruk/herobust-grief-case-star-slingers-wwhrd-remix) by [Star Slinger](http://soundcloud.com/starslingeruk)

excerpt.full: Fresh from announcing an extensive debut US tour with Baths, Star Slinger has dropped another remix upon us, and it’s as exciting as ever
